overview: You know you shouldn't, you know it isn't right but seeing your step-mom sitting there in a vulnerable state, exposed breast and looking at you for direction. Then she touches you In a way that only a mother knows how. She tells you "don't worry, no one will ever find out". Do you cross the line, give into your primal sexual urges and experience her voluptuous nurturing body?
title: Step-Son's View 3
